Package edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.tree

Class LinkedBinaryTree<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.tree.AbstractTree<E>
      • edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.tree.AbstractBinaryTree<E>
        • edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.tree.LinkedBinaryTree<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The generic type of the tree
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryTree<E>, BinaryTreeCollection<E>, Tree<E>, java.lang.Iterable<E>
    public class LinkedBinaryTree<E>
extends AbstractBinaryTree<E>
    The linked binary tree that uses linked nodes to hold data as a binary tree
    Author:
    colinscanlon
